Class SpaceStation

java.lang.Object
  SpaceStation

public class SpaceStation
extends java.lang.Object

The space station moves diagonally from upper-left to lower right. It is green on the first orbit (the first time it moves on a diagonal), yellow on the second orbit, and red thereafter until a new refueling operation begins.

Version:
September 2004, September 2005, revised by Carl Singer, September 2006, revised by Carl Singer
Author:
Carl Singer, Brian Howard, David Maharry

Constructor Summary
SpaceStation(Canvas simCanvas)
          Creates a space shuttle as a Diamond object at a random position at the top of the simulation window.
 
Method Summary
 int getXPosition()
          getXposition a simple acccessor used for the docking proceses
 int getYPosition()
          getYposition a simple acccessor used for the docking proceses
 void moveSmallDistance()
          moveSmallDistance handles orbiting details: (1) move the space station if it is within canvas boundaries (2) begin another orbit at a lower starting point if reaches the right side of the canvas.Do this by computing new initXPosition, initYPosition and moving there (2a) update orbitCount (2b) if it completed 1 orbit change its color to "yellow" (2c) if it completed 2 orbits change its color to "red" TO DO: Write the body of this method.
 void reFuel()
          reFuel the refueling process.
 void setSpeed(char newSpeed)
          setSpeed set the orbiting speed according to 'B', 'I', or 'A'.

Constructor Detail

SpaceStation

public SpaceStation(Canvas simCanvas)
Creates a space shuttle as a Diamond object at a random position at the top of the simulation window. Once the space station is initialized it should begin to orbit.

Parameters:
canvas - the canvas on which to render the space station
Method Detail

public int getXPosition()
getXposition a simple acccessor used for the docking proceses

Returns:
xPosition the current x-coordinate of the space station TO DO: Write the body of this method.

getYPosition

public int getYPosition()
getYposition a simple acccessor used for the docking proceses

Returns:
yPosition the current y-coordinate of the space station TO DO: Write the body of this method.

moveSmallDistance

public void moveSmallDistance()
moveSmallDistance handles orbiting details: (1) move the space station if it is within canvas boundaries (2) begin another orbit at a lower starting point if reaches the right side of the canvas.Do this by computing new initXPosition, initYPosition and moving there (2a) update orbitCount (2b) if it completed 1 orbit change its color to "yellow" (2c) if it completed 2 orbits change its color to "red" TO DO: Write the body of this method.

reFuel

public void reFuel()
reFuel the refueling process. The fuel cell has docked, so: - change color back to "green" - wait 3 seconds TO DO: Write the body of this method.

setSpeed

public void setSpeed(char newSpeed)
setSpeed set the orbiting speed according to 'B', 'I', or 'A'. You can experiment with xDistance and yDistance for this. TO DO: Write the body of this method.
